MAN.TITLE: matfile2sci
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: converts a Matlab 5 MAT-file into a Scilab binary file

PARAM_DESCRIPTION.SP: : character string containing the path of the Matlab input file
: character string containing the path of the Scilab output file

DESCRIPTION.P: Converts a Matlab 5 MAT-file into a Scilab binary file compatible with the function load The Matlab data types are converted into the Scilab equivalents.

MAN.AUTHOR: Serge Steer (INRIA)

BIBLIO.P: This function has been developped according to the document "MAT-File Format": matfile_format.pdf
